answers.answer: How many weeks are you?I still haven't took a glucose test

i just took mine wendsday dont eat or drink anything an hour before because they wanna see how your body reacts to sugar so they will give you this nasty drink and you have to sit and wait an hour and they will take your blood
Your not suppose to eat after midnight, your not suppose to eat til after the test because is will effect your sugar level. You can drink water that's about it.
Atleast that's what my dr made me do
I was told to eat atleast 2 hours before my appointment :/ & drink water..

You can't have anything to eat until they finish testing you. The drink they gave me was a sprite like drink, and since it was cold I finished it really fast. They took blood out 1 time every hour until they took 3 times blood from me and then I was able to go home. It'll be fast! Just go early and have something with you to entertain. Take a cold water just so you can drink water if you feel light headed
i have my glucose test tomorrow too and i have been wondering the same thing. im so nervous. i was told i could eat....but nothing with sugar but everything has sugar...ahh im so nervous
I guess I won't be eating tomorrow :/ lol. I just hope I don't pass out when they draw blood tomorrow because I pass out when I'm fasting & get blood taken out :/ I'm so nervous I hope I pass.
You can eat eggs and toast. I had peanut butter toast before mine and a glass of milk
I guess it's time for bed, my grumpy husband is calling lol but thank you ladies for all of your responses (:

Well my doctor told me the same thing no eating becsuse the drink is like really sugsry it will make you nosause becasue its really sugary but its only an hout and yea the reason they tell you to go on an empty stomach is to see how your body will react to the sugar thats how they determine if you have gestational diabetes based on these glucose test good luck.  .

question: I'm taking my glucose test tomorrow for the first time. My councelor explain a bit on what to expect but she told me not to go on an empty stomache & to drink lots of water. What am I supposed to eat?
title: Glucose Test tomorrow
